description: You'll love this pear cake frosted with a warming creamy chai cashew frosting. Perfect for a special afternoon tea or dessert.
keywords: Spiced Pear Cake with Chai Cashew Frosting

recipeIngredient: 1 cup loosely packed Whole Earth brown sugar replacement
